text: rie banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv haeyning ban chue nouv avei delke ban banhchouh tow aoy mou ham meat(kompir kuor an) del vea chea karpit mk pi mcheasa robsa puokke ku trong loub bambat nouv ampeubeab teanglay robsa puokke haey trong keloma nouv sthanphap robsa puokke
